title: Test/fix Basic Built-in Tasks
body:
For Sprint 89, the following should be implemented:

```
DownloadFile (new, since that seems to be a common inline-task)
Copy
CreateItem
FindUnderPath
MakeDir
Message
Move
ReadLinesFromFile
RemoveDir
RemoveDuplicates
AL
WriteLinesToFile
ConvertToAbsolutePath
Delete
Exec
```

All unit tests associated with these should pass.
